title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta, then remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg-cheese mixture and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken pieces until cooked.
Fry onions until golden, add tomato puree and spices.
Simmer sauce, add grilled chicken and cream.
Cook for 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.
